snippet: Dr. Johnson, a Southern-born educator who was one of the first superintendents to voluntarily use busing to integrate an urban school district, did so in White Plains in the 1960s.
abstract: Carroll F Johnson, Southern-born educator who was one of the first superintendents to voluntarily use busing to integrate an urban school district, dies at age 99.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Johnson, a Southern-born educator who was one of the first superintendents to voluntarily use busing to integrate an urban school district, did so in White Plains in the 1960s.

headline.main: Carroll F. Johnson, Schools Integrator, Dies at 99
headline.print_headline: Carroll F. Johnson, 99, Schools Integrator, Dies
